text: Fred Atkin (1887 – 1964) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back. ==References== Category:1887 births Category:1964 deaths Category:People from Caistor Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Tottenham Hotspur F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Scunthorpe United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Fred Atkin
